translated: The purity of life is the purity of the sensory element of the ears.🔽The purity of the sensory element of the ears is the purity of the sensory element of sounds.🔽The purity of the sensory element of sounds is the purity of the sensory element of auditory consciousness.🔽The purity of the sensory element of auditory consciousness is the purity of the sensory element of the nose.

analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni / srog rnam par dag pa dang / de ltar na /
translated: The purity of the sensory element of the nose is the purity of the sensory element of smells.🔽The purity of the sensory element of smells is the purity of the sensory element of olfactory consciousness.🔽The purity of the sensory element of olfactory consciousness is the purity of the sensory element of the tongue.🔽The purity of the sensory element of the tongue is the purity of the sensory element of tastes.🔽The purity of the sensory element of tastes is the purity of the sensory element of gustatory consciousness.

translated: The purity of the sensory element of gustatory consciousness is the purity of the sensory element of the body.

original: gso ba rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gso ba rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The purity of the sensory element of the body is the purity of the sensory element of tangibles.🔽The purity of the sensory element of tangibles is the purity of the sensory element of tactile consciousness.🔽The purity of the sensory element of tactile consciousness is the purity of the sensory element of the mental faculty.

analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam @16b par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sensory element of the mental faculty is the purity of the sensory element of mental phenomena.🔽The purity of the sensory element of mental phenomena is the purity of the sensory element of mental consciousness.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni /

original: gso ba rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /
analyzed: gso ba rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /
translated: The purity of the perfection of ethical discipline is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽The purity of the perfection of patience is the purity of the perfection of diligence.🔽The purity of the perfection of diligence is the purity of the perfection of concentration.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration is the purity of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The purity of the perfection of wisdom is the purity of the perfection of skillful means.🔽The purity of the perfection of skillful means is the purity of the perfection of aspiration.🔽The purity of the perfection of aspiration is the purity of the perfection of strength.🔽The purity of the perfection of strength is the purity of the perfection of knowledge.🔽The purity of the perfection of knowledge is the purity of the applications of mindfulness.🔽The purity of the applications of mindfulness is the purity of

analyzed: gso ba rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purification of a person and the purification of the sensory element of the ears, the sensory element of sounds, and the sensory element of auditory consciousness are indivisible:

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated, and they are not distinct from one another.

original: skyes bu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: skyes bu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni /

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /

translated: The purification of a person and the purification of the sensory element of the tongue, the sensory element of tastes, and the sensory element of gustatory consciousness are indivisible:🔽they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated, and they are not distinct from one another.🔽The purification of a person and the purification of the sensory element of the body, the sensory element of tangibles, and the sensory element of tactile consciousness are indivisible:
